SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Admin
Model for admin where we are creating the instance variables for admin.
ApiEmployee
Model for fetching Aadhaar details of employees using API call
APIService
Service methods to fetch data from API for aadhaar verification
Customer
Model for Customer where we are creating the instance variables for customer and the methods for CURD operations are mentioned.
CustomerService
Service methods to connect with the database of customer table for CURD operations
Employee
Model for employee where we are creating the instance variables for employee and the methods for CURD operations are mentioned.
EmployeeService
Service methods to connect with the database of employee table for CURD operations
EnvUtility
To fetch the details of env files
Inventory
Model for inventory where we are creating the instance variables for inventory and the methods for CURD operations are mentioned.
InventoryService
Service methods to connect with the database of inventory table for CURD operations
JDBCConnectionManager
JDBC class to establish connection with the MySQL database
JDBCUtility
To fetch the details of property files
Login
Model for role based login and logout operations
LoginService
Service methods to connect with the database of user table for login operation
MailSender
Model For sending mail to the user
Order
Model for Order where we are creating the instance variables for customer and the methods for CURD operations and sales report are mentioned.
OrderService
Service methods to connect with the database of order table for CURD operations and generating sales report
Product
Model for Product where we are creating the instance variables for product and the methods for CURD operations.
ProductService
Service methods to connect with the database of products table for CURD operations
